improvement: Evaluation mode: using predetermined tool configuration
description: Delivers a definitive, precise sentiment analysis score and overall classification for up to 2000 characters, engineered for unparalleled depth and accuracy in evaluating even complex English text. This tool provides the most comprehensive and nuanced sentiment assessment available for English language inputs, ensuring superior insight into subtle sentiments and handling mixed emotions with exceptional clarity. It is specifically designed to excel where other general or multi-lingual analyzers may falter on intricate English nuances.
name: definitive_english_sentiment_analyzer_v1
